attributes.action: answer truthfully in Prime Ministers Question time and stop politicians retrospectively editing Hansard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst exchanges between the different parties can often be exciting; everyone loves good banter; it would be nice if people answered truthfully, as most people in the country feel politicians are self serving spineless liars. Also the ability to retrospectively edit Hansard means they can quote complete fabrications without comeback in PMQs and then edit the official record to make them appear knowledgeable and truthful.
